title: Add Edit Interface for Tickets
description: Implement a webview panel for editing tickets, including subtasks management and support for creating new tickets with temporary items during editing
acceptance_criteria: All subtasks completed: edit interface implemented with webview panel

title: Add VS Code Command for Editing Tickets
description: Register a command in the extension to open the edit webview panel for a selected ticket
notes: Added 'horizon.editTicket' command to extension.ts that opens a webview panel for editing a ticket by ID. Currently shows placeholder HTML.
acceptance_criteria: Command registered and opens webview panel

title: Implement Webview Panel for Ticket Editing
description: Create the webview panel, load HTML form, handle basic message passing
notes: Implemented webview panel that loads edit.html, loads ticket data including subtasks, and handles basic save for update/create.
acceptance_criteria: message passing for load and save implemented

title: Design and Implement Edit Form UI
description: Build the HTML form with fields for title, description, type, priority, and subtasks list
notes: Created edit.html with form fields for title, description, type, priority, and subtasks list.
acceptance_criteria: Edit form UI implemented with all required fields

title: Implement Subtasks Management in Form
description: Add functionality to add/remove subtasks in the edit form
notes: Implemented add/remove subtasks in the edit form, with backend logic to create/update/delete subtasks and dependencies.

title: Handle Saving Existing Tickets
description: Implement save logic for updating existing tickets via message passing
notes: Implemented save logic for updating existing tickets via message passing, including subtasks changes.
acceptance_criteria: Existing tickets are updated correctly on save

title: Handle Creating New Tickets
description: Support temporary ticket creation and saving to permanent on form submit
notes: Implemented support for temporary ticket creation and saving to permanent on form submit, including subtasks.
acceptance_criteria: New tickets are created correctly with subtasks

title: Add Command for Creating New Tickets
description: Register command to open empty edit form for new tickets
notes: Registered 'horizon.createTicket' command to open empty edit form for new tickets.
acceptance_criteria: Command registered and opens edit form for new tickets

title: Integrate with Task List Refresh
description: Ensure task list updates after save/create operations
notes: Task list has file watcher that updates on changes, so save/create operations will refresh the list automatically.
